issue.title: [Python] Expose FileReader::ReadRowGroups() to Python
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6403](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6403). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Expose ReadRowGroups to Python to allow efficient filtered reading implementations as suggested @xhochy in https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/2491#issuecomment-416958663_

Without this PR users would have to re-implement threaded reads in python.
